CustomField.description: Case#1050 - 05/2011 - Rudolf Niehaus Fields that was added to be used as a sought facility related to the current facility and must be displayed on the same like as the current facility on the PDF form
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sought Facilities. If an Existing Facility is decreasing please add a New Facility (Product) with negative ‘Sought Facilities’ to reflect the decreasing Existing Facility
CustomField.label: Sought Facilities
